p: Temperature is widely considered the most important climatic factor for dengue incidence prediction, as it plays a more critical role in dengue transmission than other meteorological factors [ 13, 39, 49]. Therefore, we focused on examining the non-linear relationship between dengue vector index and temperature in this study.
